name: The Fish Market
description:
CONTROLS: ARROW KEYS + MOUSE TO EXPLORE

ALT + F4 TO EXIT GAME (but why would u want to)

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

yes hello this is my great game I made

it is a fish market except it's underwater and the fish sell stuff

made with maya & unity in 12 weeks :^0 + my first time 3d modelling!!
